page.title: 12HOME LIFE IN LILLESHALL
page.content: We interviewed a lady whose family live in a {Duke of Sutherland}cottage which is 200 years old.There are 2 adults and 3 children living there. There are 8 rooms altogether.They have 2 dogs 5 geese 9 chickens and they eat the geese on special occasions.Their electrical appliances are washing machine t.v radio dish washer hi_fi or stereo.They travel by bike or car because there aren't any bus services.Their main shopping centre is Newport. They heat their house by coal, oil, central heating and log fire.Her hobbies include swimming, baking, badminton, reading books bird watching. A mobile library comes every other week at 5 past 11. They have an acre of land.
